content.detailedDescription:
I was walking down vermont street approaching fountain, which is a busy intersection in a congested part of hollywood.  on this particular block is a hospital called hollywood presbyterian.

as i neared the intersection a man dressed in green hospital scrubs ran up to me from around the corner, his arms were flailing for my attention.  he asked me, "have you ever seen a ufo before? well turn around right now!!" he ran off to tell group of three people approximately 30 ft. up the block. 

turning around, i was awestruck and couldn't believe what i saw.  flying in the sky was a large, luminescent disc-shaped object that was unlike anything i had even seen.  it was very clearly a shiny metal color with an alternating pattern of chrome and grey on its undercarriage.  at its base was a single pulsating red light.  

immediately i knew it wasn't a plane, that was apparent.  drone perhaps? no.  my perspective adjusted and i realized it was a huge disc-shaped object that was flying at a much higher altitude than anything you would typically see.  i also figured it to be moving extremely fast and traveling in a single direction: nw to se. it was without a doubt a ufo.

i managed to take a few photos. when i was doing this i glanced back toward the sidewalk and saw the same group of people standing 30 feet away. they were witnessing the same thing as me.  all of them were looking up with their arms and fingers pointed to the sky.

shortly after, the object moved over some buildings and disappeared from my sight.  it all happened over the course of about one minute.

within a week of the sighting, i found a post on a message board describing the same incident.  also, a different person posted a video on youtube of a sighting which to me looked identical to what i saw.  both the board post and the video describe the incidences as occurring near the same time as mine and on the same date.  each one happened in an approximately 4 mile radius of my location at the time.
content.summary: Luminescent dome shaped object with a red light at its base. much larger than a plane and flying above flight path.

content.detailedDescription: My fiancee and i were walking beside my house and commenting on the stars/constellations in the sky.  she noticed a dark triangular object approximately the size of one to two moons with three amber round lights  and pointed it out to me.  we both watched as it quickly flew silently in a straight line at an unknown altitude in a southeasterly.  the sky was rather dark but the triangular shape was visible particularly as it blacked out the stars  that it passed in front of. the object became more distant appeared to turn on its side from the arrangement of the lights and then vanished in the night.  within seconds/minutes we could hear helicopters converging in the area.  my first thought was that it was either a drone or secret military aircraft.   we were both in awe and realized we had seen something inexplicable.
content.summary: Tirangular ufo with three amber lights (one at each point)

content.detailedDescription:
Residential backyard of house less than 0.25 mile east of midway intl. airport, chicago, il.  very clear night sky, even for chicago approx. 10:30pm tonight, i observed an unusually bright object at the lower of east end of the visible constellation star grouping of cassiopeia.  so bright, and slightly orange in tint, at first i thought i was looking at planet mars in the sky, but this was brighter than i've ever seen it?  also, it appeared to "twinkle": demonstrate some variation in intensity, perhaps like a star.  fixated on it now, i kept looking at this object and it seemed to be more of a crescent or rectangular shape and i could make out red edges at opposite ends of this object, too. 
   it started to drift or move slowly from a stationary position from the star pattern, and then maneuvering to a correcting course.  then i noted the object to make tight circles a few times and then that's when i realized i'm seeing something highly unusual now as its movements were too unorthodox to explain!  i witness all types of aircraft and satellite movement across the skies by the airport, day and night, but this was not behaving like anything i'd be familiar with.  went inside quickly to make two calls - had camera too - i wanted to shoot some video of this object, but i did not.  no time to call out neighbors to see this phenomenon either...  the flickering continued as i was on the cordless phone and the object wobbled, but always moved back to its stationary position while demonstration some light pulsing (not blinking) for several minutes.  
  the object then changed from the bright orange (sodium light-type color) to a dark red (tail-light)? and back again, in one second intervals for about 8 seconds or so.  
    then, a change to all red with an appearance of red at opposite ends connected by a solid red line (barbell)?   the object then proceeded to gradually move off to the northeast (parallel with stevenson freeway path towards downtown chicago) and gaining in velocity and then disappear in that direction accelerating at an high rate of speed....  wow.   amazing seeing something i can't explain!  very exhilrating!     d. melnyk/chicago-midway  oct. 14 11:55pm
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Next to midway airport: a very bright planet-like object seen at eastern tip of cassiopea, stationary then tight circles,  light pattern variation then complete color change to red and moved off quickly ne towards chicago downtown

content.detailedDescription: While driving home from work 10/13/15, i saw what appeared to be two red and one green bright lights connected to something larger, hoovering at treeline in a residential are near a main road.  i parked in a parking lot and watched it for approx 1 hour while i talked to my mom.  at first i thought they were connected to a tall tower that i had maybe never noticed before, but after just appearing stationary while flashing two red lights followed by one bright green flash for about 15 it began to slowly descend then ascend as well as move side to side.  i was so glued to the light show that i didn't think to hang up from my mom and film it with my phone. after watching for approximately an hour i decided to go home and check online to see if anyone was reporting this and found nothing.   there were many cars driving on the main road pass it.   i thought others must be seeing this because lights were unusually bright.
content.summary: 3 large red & green very bright flashing lights hoovering at treeline, moving slowly and in sync.   appeared connected to something larger.  descending & ascending then hoovering at treeline.   also moved left to right

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were taking out the trash to the roadside; he had gone out first, i followed a minute later.  he was looking up in the sky and asked, "do you see something up there?" pointing to the eastern sky. i looked and straining my eyes and blocking out an additional ambient light, i could see a faintly shimmering object, triangular, but must have been very large because hit appeared to be high in the sky.  we watched it together and the lights, also faint and dim and star-like would occasionally seem to run in a straight line and then seem to quickly trace the edge of the whatever it was.  i really don't know what it was;  i have never seen anything like it.  it just seemed to be very high up, wondering if it could possibly have been the international space station? i went out 1/2 hour later and the object was still in the same part of the sky.
content.summary: Large triangular object, shimmering, almost invisible, very high in the sky, lights at edge, center seemingly in a line, but all very distant  (space station?)

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home on bryan ave.  i noticed an object in the sky.Rge cylinder shifted from vehicle shape to horizontal shape in matter of seconds.  i stopped to take video but it disappeared. then i got home, saw it again but sudden my phone froze as i took it out. it never freezes like this. then it was gone.
content.summary: Large cylinder shifted from vehicle shape to horizontal shape in matter of seconds

content.detailedDescription: I was taken a break from a meeting.I went outside by my truck to have a smoke.I was looking up watching some turkey buzzards gliding around .When i noticed what i thought at the time was a plane . it was kind of odd because it wasn't moving that fast and was a very bright white. i kept watching it as it slowly came in my direction. then i noticed it had no wings. but i started doubting what i was looking at.Then it went into or above a cloud. well i waited for it to emerge from the cloud and it did. now its right over my head and with out any doubt it had no wings.Then i noticed there was like a ring  or a separate part about 1\4 from the end. well it kept going until i lost site of it. when it all ended my hair was standing on end. i went back into my meeting and told the story and drew a picture of what i saw. i have to say , i know what i saw but the feeling of maybe i should of kept it to my self.
content.summary: A slow straight line flight

content.detailedDescription: Photo
content.summary: Photo

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out with witness on the phone, at mufon hq, by field investigator l. flechtner #18809 on 10/14/2015
----------------------------------------------------------------------
monday the 12th, at 1:52 pm, driving in the car with wife, she pointed out a plumb of gray smoke going into a black/gray smoky tunnel and disappearing. we could see a plumb of smoke behind something, maybe a rocket. then it went into a gray tunnel, like a worm hole and disappear. it was pretty high up, as high as 35,ooo feet. it was going west to east. made no sound.
then later we noticed three clouds that had holes in them, like donuts.
content.summary: Monday the 12th driving in the car with wife, she pointed out a plumb of gray smoke going into a gray smoky tunnel and disappearing

content.detailedDescription: Object rose in the east, above lame wallenpaupack, hovered over our campfire on the western side, then vanished to the west. we have photos
content.summary: Saw ufo over the lake. vanished after hovering over us

content.detailedDescription: I was riding in my moms car and almost home when i saw it. i was laying down with the seat tilted back and i saw a bright sun reflection in my eye. i first thought it was a beam of light reflecting off the window but then i noticed something floating in the air outside. it was moving parallel with our car and fast. my mom asked what i was looking at and when i told her we stopped and looked out the window. to make sure that it was not a beam of light reflecting off the window i rolled down my window. we made a right turn and pointed at it so my mom could see it and when she saw it we wondered what it was and we drove to our gravel driveway. when we parked i got out, walked down our driveway, but when i got there it was gone.My feeling were calm and collective.
content.summary: Chrome  metal oval maybe rotating bobbed up and down a little

content.detailedDescription: It always appeared in the basement or bedroom i was always told not to say anything about the astronaut. i've never heard of anyone else seeing this on any social media or network.  but lately i've been having night tares i feel bet up almost every morning. i've never said anything about this just got it off my chest.
content.summary: I can remember it as if it was yesterday i was hand on hand with a astronaut face to face

content.detailedDescription: I was standing out on the front porch with a friend of mine watching fireworks from a very far distance all of a sudden i saw a red hovering light come into view intensely bright red after that it stopped like it was almost sneaking up on what it was wanting to look at  it hoverd for a while then went back in the direction that it came at a very high speed. then the object came back into view on the same path. this time it  came in to veiw at the same spot as before stopped on a dime hovered for 45 seconds and then went back  the same path that it came and did this 3 different times. i can't belive i  was too stupid to not pull out my phone but it was so bright and fascinating by the way it moved i couldn't take my eyes off of it i was afraid i might miss something. it was extremly bright it was on the il side of the mississippi river and went north to south 3 times stopped in the same spot all theee times and travled at a very very high speed ... i compared it to any aircraft i'm familiar with and couldn't it was for sure a ufo!
content.summary: Object moving north to south and stop and hovered then continued moving at high speed

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out report with witness on the phone, at mufon hq, by field investigator l. flechtner 18809. 10/14/2015

--------------------------------------------------------------------
i was outside and saw a red, white and blue lighted star zig-zagging very high in the sky. i got my binoculars and videoed it through the binoculars with my camera phone. i have 48  videos of the lighted object. it is faster than lighting, no sound. it goes up and down and comes from the east to move toward the west. first it turned its red light off and then the blue lights and then the white light went to blue at the end. the one time i got a good look at it, it was the perfect shade of purple and shaped like a square.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Was outside and saw a red, white and blue lighted star zig-zagging very high in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out at mufon hq with witness on the  phone by field investigator l. flechtner 18809, on 10/14/2015

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
almost every night for the past 14 to 15 years i have seen this bright star flashing and changing position and then flashing again and changing position in the sky. sometimes the flashes are really bright and sometimes they are fainter. i live near harrisburg international airport, and three mile island, so i see a lot of commercial and military aircraft fly over all the time. i usually see this flashing ufo in the darkest part of the sky, near the tail of the big dipper. i have seen satellites and meteors and this flashing ufo seems to be in front of them. this happens almost every night and while this flashing ufo moves all over the nw sky it seems to always be somewhere in that area.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Almost every night for the past 14 to 15 years i have seen this bright star flashing and changing position and then flashing again

content.detailedDescription: Saw object come from the south east moving very fast. 10 mins before we had seen something fall from the sky. it was white and looked bright we thought it was a shooting star that fell very close to earth. my roommates and i noticed this red object was fast and in the same area as the shooting star. almost as if it was searching for whatever fell to earth. it was moving east to west would travel very fast and stop and hover. it descended 2 times. the second time it didn't come back up. as i previously stated two of my roommates were present and will back my story.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object moved fast then came to a complete stop, and then hovered then decended

content.detailedDescription: Taking daughter to school at 7am on 10-14-15 an as usuall in a sky watcher. so as in looking south at the sky i see this humongous metal black cigar shaped ufo just sitting off on a 45 degree angle. as i'm in awe i state to my daughter who is 11 do you see that and i try to set her eye on location but she said no as i stood there. she entered the school so i ran in signed her in and told the supervisor there's a ufo outside and what a look i got. i go back out side it still there same spot and angle so i run to my car like a madman grab phone and it just pof disappears sort of through the cloud and the only shot i have is the sort o hole through cloud. i'm so disappointed but i've seen many ufo's in my life plus had alien contact as a kid which many people say was a dream. i never dreamed of my entire family at a party and et froze everyone and took me for a trip but that's a story for another day. this sighting of ship was at over 500feet and i took picture even though it vanished so we can estimate size. i believe it was 1000ft long. picture is just for size relevance
content.summary: Taking daughter to school 1000 ft cigar ufo hovering in sky

content.detailedDescription:
I went on a quick drive with my high school buddy and his two friends to have some beers before we had to play the halftime show in the high school pep band for our basketball team when we turned a 90 degree turn on an old country road and saw a creature that was about 4' tall with huge eyes and big ears that came to a point. it seemed to have longer arms in proportion to its body with what would seem to be hands almost touching the ground. i cannot remember if it had a color to it or not. as har as hair goes, i cannot remember that very well either. the ears and the eyes is what was so bizarre and it lookied like it was kind of squatting there. we saw it for at the most 6 seconds but that was enough. i knew the spot well because my girlfriend and i used to park behind a little mound  right where the creature stood. just myself and the other student sitting next to me saw it. the ligh from the side marker in the front of the car is the light we saw it in as we were in the back seat of the car which was a 1970's camero. we both turned to each other and i said, "did you see that!" and we then went back and forth describing the thing like, " it had big ears," and then he would say " yea, and  it seemed like it had some hair on them" ect...... my friend the driver tore off in a hurry as the tone of our voices were very serious. i was not friends with this student sitting next to me so they knew we were serious. we never talked about it after that.
i have to tell you i was raised in that area and was an avid fisherman and outdoorsman. i was in the scouts with the driver who became and eagle scout. i know every animal in the wild. it was not a gopher, groundhog or anything close. i am now 47 and i can almost see it in my mind. it was watching us drive by. about a half mile away is carbon limestone and there are a lot of quarries we used to fish and drink at. oh, and we had barely had one beer that night. i saw a video about someon who saw something similar called a pukwudghie or something. all i know is what i saw and it was real i swear to you. i can give you the names of the others if you like. 
    later in life i had another incident i really don't like to talk about but someone should know. i used to have horrible dreams and my wife at the time used to wake me. after our divorce, i woke up with a burning sensation on my arm. i mean it felt like i had burned my skin. there were 2 sets of 3 scratches on my right arm. i tried using neosporin, hydrodrgen peroxide, and soap for about 15 minutes until it calmed down. i do not wake easily and i watched the scratches welt up and start to bleed. i took a picture of them if you need it. 
     i have felt evil before in my life only a few times but that's enough to make believe that these things are evil. that is truely my opinion. i believe they are some kind of nephelim like in the bible. 
      good luck on your cause and best regards.
content.summary: Creature sighting unidentifiable

content.detailedDescription: Outside again snapping photos all night and found these rods in picture. 3 of them..1 at top of picture, 1 bottom right and 1 to the left
content.summary: Rods in photo

content.detailedDescription: I have so much to tell i think you need to know i feel that someone            any way people should if someone see this i have avery lot to tell un
content.summary: It has messed with me all my life   really

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was outside my home walking the dogs with my mom. we were looking at the stars when my mom pointed at something and said "look". i looked up where my mom pointed and saw something that looked like a star moving across the sky at a high speed. it changed direction often but it seemed like they/it knew where it was heading. my family believe that there are someone else out there so i thought that it was something from somewhere else 
in the universe straight away. i tried to come up with a reasonable explanation like a comet or something but things like that does not move the way this object did. neither my mom or i reacted or felt a special way, i felt normal. i just was facinated and wondered what it was. my mom was neutral, she did not care that much since she was not that surprised, she just said "well you know, i believe that there are others out there, it is not a surprise"
we did not really loose sight of the object, we just had to continue the walk with the dogs. but i saw that it was flying further away. i would have stayed longer to watch it but i had to follow my mom.
content.summary: The ufo looked like a regular star, it was very high up and it did now blink. spotted a plane "under" it on the side, so you saw the difference. it did not go in a straight line, it changed direction often and was at a high speed.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on the 15 freeway from lake elsinore toward corona california when something shiny caught my eye when i looked i thought it was an old transport airplane but then noticed it wasn't moving so i kept my eye on it and after about 15-20 seconds the ufo went from hovering to flying straight up and away from me and out of site in a less then 2 seconds.  i was a little freaked out and my friend who was in the front passenger seat didn't believe it actually just happened and was in denial.
content.summary: Cigar blimp shaped chrome/silver craft was hovering about some hills then took off quickly

content.detailedDescription: I believe i have been visited several times over the course of my life.. most recently was in my home last night. in the past i blocked it out, but last night i made an attempt at communicating and remembering what was happening and what i was feeling. i felt like i woke up to a presence in my room but was paralyzed. i tried to open my eyes but they would not open. i felt intense fear at first and was sweating and my heart was pounding in my chest and what felt like pounding in the back of my head. i then tried to relax and attempted to talk or communicate by thinking the words.. "what are you doing to me and why are you doing it? i wasn't asking in a panicked way.. but in a way telling them that i didn't mind what they were doing, but i would like to know what it was for...)it seemed like i was able to get a couple of very brief and minor glimpses of what a traditional grey alien was, but it seemed to close up and brief to be able to make out the rest of the surroundings. i felt pressure on my chest and intially felt some form of contact on my face and head and then a pressure or pulling sensation in my scrotum and testicles. my body then relaxed a bit  and the pounding in my head and my heart began slowing and it felt like i opened my eyes, but my mind seemed to be still fuzzy or cloudy, like i was in a dream or illusion of some kind. at that time, i remember a different looking being looking at me with a peaceful.. almost caring/loving smile. i can only describe it as having long/ slender limbs, long flowing blond hair, larger than human eyes, but very human looking.. a very small nose and blueish skin. this being was what seemed like a very attractive female hybrid of some sort. i am not sure how long it lasted but i estimate it to be 30-45 minutes. it feels odd describing this in this manner and i don't take this lightly.. i don't understand it, and i didn't know who to share it with.. if at all. "j"
content.summary: Read below

content.detailedDescription: At 8:45pm after returnign from dinner i observed an object south west of freer tx. the lights were faint and in a distinct  v shape. at first i thought it was a falling star but is was moving a little slower. then i noticed that it was not just one light, but rather a series in a distinct formation. the entire thing went from mid sky to the horizon south of freer in 3-5 seconds. no blinking lights and no sound.
content.summary: V shaped object with faint lights heading south from freer tx

content.detailedDescription: This happened when my children were small. i had just picked them up from my mothers house and we had stopped by the grocery store on the way home. i live way out in the country so was going down a country road south of town when i spotted some very bright lights in the sky through the trees in front of me. this was late in the day about 5:00pm i guess, it has been a long time ago since this happened. we were heading east so the sun was behind us. at first i thought it was a plane and kept waiting for it to fly over us, but it never did. it stayed in the same place and i was getting closer to it as i drove along. finally i could see that it was over a lake. i turned off the road i was on to get closer to it. the road to the lake makes a sharp left turn and as i slowed down i could see four very bright lights in a row right over the dam in front of us. i rolled the window down and could not hear a sound coming from the craft. it was just hovering over the water and dam. my son was looking at it out his side of the car and when i looked away there was a little boy riding his bicycle coming toward me and he was looking at it too and i was afraid he was going to run into my car. when i looked back at the object it turned and shot off to the north over the trees. i tried to follow it but could not see it anymore and my youngest son was scared and was crying in the backseat so i went home. when i got home my husbands grandmother called and said that the news was reporting sightings of lights in the sky in the area i just left. i never did find out what it was and do not know of anyone else that saw it besides me and my son. he says that he can still remember seeing it. and we found out that the little boy on the bike is a friend of my sons and he can remember it too. i wish i new what it was. i will never forget it. i had a similar experience when i was very little probably in the mid 60's at my parents house in town. was raking the yard with my dad when i went down to the street to put straw into the ditch. i looked up and saw a dark greenish disc going over the road with smoke coming out the back. i remember being very scared and running to my dad and crying.
content.summary: Observed four very bright lights hovering over a lake and dam near my home

content.detailedDescription:
I was with 2 friends, we had just arrived home and were walking up the path to my front door.  we were 15 years old and it was late summer of 1975.  i was looking for my house key when we heard a humming sound and saw an intense light over head.  we looked up to see a round aircraft with purple and green bright lights hovering. we had no idea what the object was but were sure it was some type of ufo.  it was not like anything we had ever seen or could explain.  the noise it made and the colors made it clear that it was not an airplane or helicopter. none of us said anything or moved and within a minute the aircraft lifted up and disappeared completely out of sight.  we ran up the steps and pounded on my brother's window to let us in.
i tried to tell my parents the next day but they thought we were making it up.  we never spoke about it again.  i am now 53 and called on of my friends about 6 months ago to ask her if she remembered the event.  to my total shock she said she had no recollection so i thought i was crazy.   i described this event to a friend who happened to catch the tv show and called me to turn it on.  i couldn't believe it when i realized i was not crazy as some kids on long island saw exactly what i saw in the summer of 1977 and they went on to explain that sometimes people do not have any memory of this happening!!!
content.summary: Heard humming sound looked up to see extreme purple & green/white lights in circle. hovered then shot straight up and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: 10/14/2015 6:14 am, highway 17 north in camden county north carolina, approximately 2 miles from chesapeake virginia, a series of pulsating white lights flying in a 'v' formation towards chesapeake virginia.
content.summary: Approximately  20 +/- lights flying in a 'v' formation, lights pulsated

content.detailedDescription: Standing in bedroom looking out window saw flashing white light in sky red green and blue light changeling from side to side it hoverd for some time then gaind altitude rapidly in a zig zag then shot across sky left to right faster then any plane i have ever seen hoverd for a while more then slowly returned to were it started hoverd there for while then did circle stopped then moved back and forth several times then went from just being as bright as a plane at night yo he brightest thing in sky so bright it was lighting sky around it made the hair on my neck stand up so wired tried to film with phone but could not get photo or vid sceen was all grey made no sound
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Every clear night from sept 19 to now still seeing it

content.detailedDescription:
I went out for a cigarette at 6.30am (gmt) this morning and this object was just sitting there in the sky to the east. although it was glowing like a star, i knew it was too big ... the other stars were tiny in comparison and you can't even see them in the pic. i sat and watched it for 10 mins and it didn't seem to move. it wasn't until i looked at the pic this morning and zoomed in, i notice that it's spherical.

it may be totally unrelated, but the second pic i took at 9.00am. this isn't the sun (it was south-east) but it actually looked like the sky had 2 suns for a bit, and like the sun, it hurt my eyes to look at it.
content.summary: Ufo over scotland?

content.detailedDescription:
I was with my wife and our 2 children returning by road from seattle, washington going to winnipeg, canada. we stopped to fuel up in bismack, montana. since we were not familiar with the area, we ran into e dead end street. why still at the dead end, we notice a very powerful light beaming down from not too high above the ground. the first thought was that it was a helicopter and realizing that there was no sound emanating from the craft made me wondered, but i dismissed it and when to fuel-up at a filling station close to the highway. after we got back on the road to continue our journey, we found the the traffic on the highway had come to a complete stop as a result of the activities of the ufo

every vehicle on the highway abandoned their journey but we had no choice, so we continued. the ufo decided to keep us company on our journey. when i accelerated, the ufo kept up. when i slowed down, the ufo slowed down and when i came to a complete stop, it does likewise.It was able to ascend so high and so fast to the point that it looked like one of the stars in the sky.

when we got the emmerson to clear the canadian immigration, the ufo stayed suspended up there and as we resumed the journey, so did the ufo. the ufo stayed with us from emmerson to winnipeg city limit which is 65 miles.

the ufo disappeared when we got to winnipeg city limit and we thought that was the end of the episode but when we got to our house, my 5 year son looked up and saw the ufo suspended directly over our house. it was daylight already but fear did not permit me to have a good study look at it. the little saw of it did not resemble any air or space craft that i have ever seen. the outer shell of the ufo  was such that you can see the inside. it a looked like there were 2 beings inside, but i did not deep enough to give a description of them.
content.summary: It followed us from bismack, montana usa to winnipeg, manitoba canada
